title: Key Fragments aren't showing up.
body: Hey everyone, pretty simple but disappointing issue. I keep receiving key fragments (for good sportsmanship it says) and then I don't actually get them. I've gotten 4 now where it pops up and says keep it up and then I don't see it in my loot. Any thoughts?{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body: Was this all today?  Sometimes the notification menu doesn't go away so you might be seeing old toasts.  Sometimes, you also might need to relog to make sure you're sync'd up.  I looked into this for you, and the last fragment that I see being obtained was 2 days ago.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xPWWy1Le,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-23T20:21:09.457+0000)
>
> Was this all today?  Sometimes the notification menu doesn't go away so you might be seeing old toasts.  Sometimes, you also might need to relog to make sure you're sync'd up.  I looked into this for you, and the last fragment that I see being obtained was 2 days ago.  Let me know if that clears things up!

It happened awhile ago too (and I cant play everyday cause of work so getting the fragments today was probably from 2 days ago), and I did relog and it still hasn't appeared. It could be old notifications, not sure though. I'm not gonna whine about it though, I have plenty of in game skins already so hope this helps others that might have this issue. Thanks!
